verses.roman:
tabe tāṅre ethā āmi āniba satvara
niścaya kahilāṅa, kichu sandeha nā kara

synonyms: tabe—in this way; tāṅre—Him; ethā—here; āmi—I; āniba satvara—shall bring very soon; niścaya—with certainty; kahilāṅa—I spoke; kichu sandeha nā kara—do not be doubtful.
translation: "In this way I shall bring Him here very soon. Be assured that I am telling you the truth. Do not be doubtful.
